page.title: 07A 11yrs Old Child's Weekend.
page.content: On Saturday I wake up at about 8am and watch T.V and have breakfast before washing and dressing. At midday we collect Mum from work by car and have lunch.In the afternoon my brother and sister visit my nan while Mum ,Dad and I go shopping at Cambridge where I usually spend my pocket money on a record.In the evening I watch T.V. before getting ready for bed although I do not go to sleep before I have a drink and read a little. On Sunday I don't really get up before 11a.m. and by the time I've had toast for breakfast it's time to fetch Mum from work. After dinner and perhaps a trip to, and stroll around St Neots, I play with Samantha. Occasionally my granddad visits us in the evening after which it's time for a bath,television and bed.
